name: The Illness Called Love 1.0 Early Access
name_original: The Illness Called Love 1.0 Early Access
description:
Suki is a girl who just started in a new high school. Having been bullied in the past, she’s unwilling to socialize in this new environment. But at each turn, Suki finds herself drawn further and further by certain personalities – like her old childhood friend who seems keen on speaking to her, a particularly stoic member of the occult club, or a rough n’ tough delinquent who’s more than meets the eye. Who are these people? What makes them so different? What makes Suki different? And who is that lurking in the shadows that seems to be following around wherever Suki goes? It could all be her imagination, but whatever happens, Suki’s in for a wild ride at Yanagi High School.

WARNING: foul language, violence, and explicit themes and topics such as torture, suicide, depression, and abuse.

-THIS GAME IS AN EARLY ACCESS FOR THE HORROR GAME JAM AND NOT THE FULL/FINAL VERSION-

What is missing from the early access build:

-Polyamorous routes/paths/storylines

-"happy"/lover endings

-final voice acting

The full version will come no later than the end of 2018.

{NOTES: I wrote, drew, edited, and coded everything with the help of Ren'Py. I made most of the original music through GarageBand, and the rest were from Royalty Free Sites, which are credited in the game's bonus menu.}

[This is essentially a yandere yuri. It will also be a sample to an even bigger game with more characters.]

There will be voice acting! I already have all the characters casted.
